descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Dwight Powell hauls in the dime from Maxi Kleber and knocks down the and-1 for the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet pass from Maxi Kleber) 2022/03/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Maxi Kleber dimes Dwight Powell for a Mavs and-1

videos.description: Maxi Kleber takes flight and rejects the Timberwolves at the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Maxi Kleber with an elite rejection at the rim) 2022/03/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Maxi Kleber with an elite rejection at the rim

videos.description: Luka Doncic lets it fly and drills it from 3-point land.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka Doncic shows off range with deep 3-pointer) 2022/03/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka drains the 3 from the top of the key

videos.description: Dwight Powell gathers the dime from Frank Ntilikina and throws it down to extend the Mavericks' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Frank Ntilikina with the no-look dime to Dwight Powell for the flush) 2022/03/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Frank Ntilikina with the no-look dime to Dwight Powell for the flush

videos.description: Reggie Bullock hauls in the dime from Luka Doncic and drains the corner three.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Reggie Bullock buries the corner 3 for the Mavs) 2022/03/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Reggie Bullock buries the corner 3 for the Mavs

videos.description: Dwight Powell skies for the alley-oop jam to extend the Mavericks' lead in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka Doncic shows off their vision with nice pass vs. Minnesota Timberwolves) 2022/03/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka lobs a beauty to Dwight Powell for the alley-oop
